name: SpeechGrammar.src
description: The src property of the SpeechGrammar interface sets and returns a string containing the grammar from within in the SpeechGrammar object.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The src property of the SpeechGrammar interface sets and returns a string containing the grammar from within in the SpeechGrammar object.
